devdoc.author: Stanisław Głogowski <stan@pillarproject.io>
devdoc.details: After the transfer to consumer's account is done, the token will be automatically burned and withdrawn. Use `startConsuming` to become a consumer.

ConsumerAdded(address).details: Emitted when the new consumer is added

ConsumerRemoved(address).details: Emitted when the existing consumer is removed

devdoc.title: Wrapped wei token

userdoc.notice: One to one wei consumable ERC20 token
